content:
CFS-SL RK Firestop retrofit sleeve kit Retrofit cable pathway device for firestopping existing cable applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop devices and sleeves- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster and easier installation for existing cables with ability to re-penetrate Integrated smoke seal – no additional products required Oversized flange for irregular and oversized openings Tested for telecom, low- and mid-voltage cables Mold and mildew resistant acording to ASTM-G21 Applications Sealing existing cable penetrations through walls and floors Suitable for small to medium-sized openings in walls, ceilings and floors Electrical, low-voltage/mid-voltage and telecom Ideal for irregular and oversized openings around existing cables For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 10Smoke development: 15 LEED VOC: 4.9 g/l Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 10
Smoke development: 15 | LEED VOC | 4.9 g/l | Product Class | Ultimate | Application temperature range | 40 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Temperature resistance range | 5 - 140 °F ### ITEMS- 2064089 - FS retrofit sleeve CFS-SL RK 2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2064270 - FS retrofit sleeve CFS-SL RK 4 - Package Size 1 pc
